company.name: Berger Estate & Elder Law P.A.
company.description: Based in Leawood, Kansas, Berger Estate & Elder Law P.A. has been providing exceptional legal representation in the areas of life and estate planning, medicaid family planning, probate and trust administration and elder law since 1987. Our attorneys are dedicated to developing long-term relationships with our clients and are committed to providing you with sensible solutions for complex legal problems.
company.hours: Monday through Friday from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.

hero.headline: Providing Trusted Counsel And Proactive Solutions Throughout Kansas City For Over 30 Years!
hero.subheadline: Our goal at Berger Estate & Elder Law, P.A. is to provide you the highest quality of legal counsel in an atmosphere of compassion and friendship.

about.headline: About Us
about.content: Based in Leawood, Kansas, Berger Estate & Elder Law P.A. has been providing exceptional legal representation in the areas of life and estate planning, medicaid family planning, probate and trust administration and elder law since 1987. Our attorneys are dedicated to developing long-term relationships with our clients and are committed to providing you with sensible solutions for complex legal problems. Our goal is to provide the highest quality of estate planning and elder law counsel in an atmosphere of compassion and friendship.

seo.title: Berger Estate & Elder Law P.A. - Estate Planning, Elder Law, Medicaid, and Probate
seo.description: Berger Estate and Elder Law Attorneys have been serving Kansas City with estate planning and elder law services for over 30 years. Our goal is to provide the highest quality of legal counsel an atmosphere of compassion and friendship. Call us Today!
